languages.text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Each stack grants a −10 penalty to any Willpower and Fellowship tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Wurde er außerhalb des Kampfes erhalten, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Jeder aufaddierte Effekt führt zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf jede Probe für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.

languages.text: 每层效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}检定承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果都会使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 a cualquier prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}判定に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при прохождении любых проверок {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: Her birikim, her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verir. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
